title.rendered: J.LINDEBERG AW24 during Copenhagen Fashion Week

content.rendered:
J.LINDEBERG Fall-Winter 2024 COLLECTION at Copenhagen Fashion Week

J.Lindeberg was born out of an idea to inject style and energy to golf by changing how players all over the world dress on and off the course. Since 1996, we've continued to bridge our worlds of fashion and sports with irreverence, offering sophisticated, edgy and comfortable products for a modern active lifestyle. J.Lindeberg first launched in the summer of 1996, in Stockholm and New York simultaneously. Our founder, Johan Lindeberg, had a desire to challenge conventions and an idea to modernize the golfing fashion landscape, leaving the stale and the conservative behind. Our first brand ambassador, Jesper Parnevik, put the brand on the map when wearing our now-iconic pink pants as he won the AT&T Byron Nelson tournament on the PGA Tour in 2000.Today, J.Lindeberg has grown into a fashion and sports brand with a worldwide presence, offering innovative pieces within fashion, golf, ski, tennis, outdoor and more.

Runway Looks

Photo: Press J.Lindeberg

More on: @jlindebergofficial


By Senior Fashion Editor 24FashionTV: Christina V Henningstad @christina_henningstad
